[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Christina” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”80%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/Christina-Curtis-Head-of-Talent-Strategy-Blackhorn-Ventures-Team-1.jpg” alt=”Christina Curtis – Head of Talent Strategy – Blackhorn Ventures Team” title_text=”Christina Curtis – Head of Talent Strategy – Blackhorn Ventures Team” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”HeadShot” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ text_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Christina Curtis

Senior Advisor of Talent Strategy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Bio” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Christina Curtis joined the Blackhorn Team in February 2022.  A thought leader on motivation and goal attainment, she currently writes for Harvard Business Review, Forbes, and Psychology Today. Christina’s worked with executives from Google, KPMG, DaVita, Overstock.com, Xerox, USAP and Union Pacific. She has been interviewed for leadership podcasts available on Itunes and Sirius Radio, and is a certified Master coach, a designation held by less than 1% of coaches globally.

Christina holds the following accreditations:

  • Masters of Science degree in Organizational Psychology from the University of London
  • Bachelor of Arts, honors degree from Queens University
  • Master Coach from International Coaching Federation
  • Neuroscience of Leadership from the NeuroLeadership Institute
  • Business coaching from the Adler School of Psychology
  • Hogan Leadership Assessment Specialist

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/team/” button_text=”Back To Full Team” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Team Button” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”J||divi||400″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Based in Colorado. Click here to learn why.

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Policy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Twitter-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://twitter.com/blackhornvc” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Twitter” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/YouTube-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH9wQgFr5goz-lf9nsjE0pw” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Youtube Icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LinkedIn-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/blackhorn-ventures/” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Linkedin icon” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”23%” max_width_tablet=”20%” max_width_phone=”8%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
